entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -13.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
